Steps.Description: Check the cookies after submitting the form.

StepDetails.Hypothesis: The attacker hypothesizes that there might be a cookie controlling access.
StepDetails.Action: The attacker inspects the cookies after submitting the form.
StepDetails.Result: The attacker finds a 'not_admin' cookie with a value of 1.

Steps.Description: Change the value of the 'not_admin' cookie.

StepDetails.Hypothesis: The attacker hypothesizes that changing the value of the 'not_admin' cookie may grant access.
StepDetails.Action: The attacker modifies the value of the 'not_admin' cookie from 1 to 0.
StepDetails.Result: The attacker successfully changes the value of the 'not_admin' cookie.

Steps.Description: Refresh the page and check for the flag.

StepDetails.Hypothesis: The attacker hypothesizes that changing the value of the 'not_admin' cookie will reveal the flag.
StepDetails.Result: The attacker retrieves the flag: TUCTF{D0nt_Sk1p_C00k13_Duty}
